full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL MA'I RLUNG RTA BSKYED TSUL BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES SGROL MA'I RLUNG RTA BSKYED TSUL BKA SHIS @006A *, ,RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DZA YA PAndI TA'I DGON PA NAS RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA AA YU SIDDHIS BSKUL NGOR, KHUNGS THUB KYI YIG CHA DKA' YAD SNGON GYI YIG RNYING DAD PAN CHEN CHOS RGYAN GYI GSUNG YIN ZER BA ZHIG 'DUG PA GZHI BYAS TE, DGE SLONG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSOS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS SO, ,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
